attributes.action: Consider bringing in a white paper regarding unlawfull Security Firms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why can any Security Firm be allowed to break the law by not paying thier staff the mnimum wage, expect them to be on call 24/7 and not take thier holiday entitlement. If a Security Firm is taken to an employment tribunal or court and they are ruled against then surely that firm should lose thier licence just as a criminal could face a fine or prison.
